item.title: Voxtral Realtime
item.description: arXiv:2602.11298v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We introduce Voxtral Realtime, a natively streaming automatic speech recognition model that matches offline transcription quality at sub-second latency. Unlike approaches that adapt offline models through chunking or sliding windows, Voxtral Realtime ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> audio, arxiv, framework, model, alignment | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 80%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)
